text: Indonesia participated in the 1982 Asian Games in Delhi, India on November 19 to December 4, 1982. Indonesia finished sixth in total medals. ==Medal summary== ===Medal table=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center;" ! width=180|Sport !scope="col" style="background:gold; width:55px;"|Gold !scope="col" style="background:silver; width:55px;"|Silver !scope="col" style="background:#cc9966; width:55px;"|Bronze !
